org.cleverbus.core.common.dao
Interface MessageDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
MessageDaoJpaImpl
public interface MessageDao

DAO for Message entity.

Author:
Petr Juza

findPartlyFailedMessage

@Nullable
Message findPartlyFailedMessage(int interval)
Finds ONE message in state MsgStateEnum.PARTLY_FAILED.

Parameters:
interval - Interval (in seconds) between two tries of partly failed messages.
Returns:
message or null if there is no any message

findPostponedMessage

@Nullable
Message findPostponedMessage(int interval)
Finds ONE message in state MsgStateEnum.POSTPONED.

Parameters:
interval - Interval (in seconds) after that can be postponed message processed again
Returns:
message or null if there is no any message

updateMessageForLock

Boolean updateMessageForLock(Message msg)
Updates message (set start timestamp of processing) - gets lock for message.

Parameters:
msg - the message
Returns:
true when update was successful otherwise false

findProcessingMessages

List<Message> findProcessingMessages(int interval)
Finds processing messages.

Parameters:
interval - Interval (in seconds) after that processing messages are probably in dead-lock
Returns:
list of messages

getCountMessages

int getCountMessages(MsgStateEnum state,
                     @Nullable
                     Integer interval)
Gets count of messages in specified state

Parameters:
state - the state
interval - Interval (in seconds) after that messages must be updates; in other words get count of messages updated in specified interval
Returns:
count

getCountProcessingMessagesForFunnel

int getCountProcessingMessagesForFunnel(String funnelValue,
                                        int idleInterval,
                                        String funnelCompId)
Gets count of processing messages (PROCESSING, WAITING, WAITING_FOR_RES) with same funnel value and for specified funnel ID.

Parameters:
funnelValue - the funnel value
idleInterval - interval (in seconds) that determines how long can be message processing
funnelCompId - the funnel component ID
Returns:
count of messages

getMessagesForGuaranteedOrderForRoute

List<Message> getMessagesForGuaranteedOrderForRoute(String funnelValue,
                                                    boolean excludeFailedState)
Gets list of messages with specified funnel value for guaranteed processing order of whole routes.

Parameters:
funnelValue - the funnel value
excludeFailedState - FAILED state is used by default; use true if you want to exclude FAILED state
Returns:
list of messages ordered by message timestamp

getMessagesForGuaranteedOrderForFunnel

List<Message> getMessagesForGuaranteedOrderForFunnel(String funnelValue,
                                                     int idleInterval,
                                                     boolean excludeFailedState,
                                                     String funnelCompId)
Gets list of messages with specified funnel value for guaranteed processing order of messages for specified funnel.

Parameters:
funnelValue - the funnel value
idleInterval - interval (in seconds) that determines how long can message be processing
excludeFailedState - FAILED state is used by default; use true if you want to exclude FAILED state
funnelCompId - the funnel component ID
Returns:
list of messages ordered by message timestamp

findMessagesByContent

List<Message> findMessagesByContent(String substring)
Finds message by substring in message payload.

Parameters:
substring - the substring of payload
Returns:
list of message or empty list if not available
